DOC.brief_title: Variation Serum Prolactin Levels During IntraCytoplasmic Sperm Injection
DOC.detailed_description: Methodology detail : After apply inclusion exclusion criterion infertile patient schedule start ICSI cycle kasr alainy assist reproduction unit , take patient 's informed consent blood sample draw . The baseline serum prolactin level record first blood sample schedule take operating room induction anesthesia ovum pickup . A Second blood sample take two hour aspiration last follicle recovery room post-operatively . A third final blood sample take Embryo transfer .The blood sample send immediately central laboratory Kasr Alainy Cairo University Hospital obtain every occasion , Serum prolactin analyze immunoassay time . Descriptive data age , type infertility & cause record . Also result every serum prolactin level record well type protocol use ovulation induction , number oocyte retrieve ovum pick , embryo grade day transfer . Serum beta human chorionic gonadotropin ( B-hCG ) drawn patient 2 week date embryo transfer determine pregnancy record . Statistical analysis do laboratory result , All statistical calculation perform use computer program SPSS ( Statistical Package Social Science ; SPSS Inc. ) version 15 Microsoft Windows
DOC.criteria: Age : adult female > 20 year old . Complaining infertility 1ry 2ry & schedule ICSI . Hyperprolactinemia patient . Severe Male factor infertility Frozen embryo transfer cycle Uterine Anomalies . Repeated implantation failure ICSI . Any contraindication Pregnancy ( serious uncontrolled medical disease Diabetes , heart disease , hypertension ) , mental illness , ovarian tumor , cancer location Acute inflammatory disease ) . On medication know alter prolactin level e.g antipsychotic , Atypical agent risperidone Thyroid dysfunction . Medical disorder affect serum prolactin eg acromegaly , chronic renal failure hypothyroidism .
